videos.description: Luka Doncic tosses up a lob to Dwight Powell, who goes up to flush down a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka tosses to Powell for a flush) 2022/02/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka tosses to Powell for a flush

videos.description: Marquese Chriss leaves the rim shaking after he elevates to deliver a powerful dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Marquese Chriss rocks the rim on this slam) 2022/02/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Marquese Chriss rocks the rim on this slam

videos.description: Josh Giddey finishes with 14 points and 10 assists as the Thunder edge Dallas in overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giddey double-doubles in OT win over Mavs) 2022/02/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giddey gets double-double in OT win over Mavs
